translation.en: [woman] Peter! [grunts] Peter!
[woman] Peter!
[Peter] Hello, dear.
Look. [breathes heavily]
Look, I know you love Christmas, but there's no need to shag the tree.
translation.it: So che ami il Natale, ma non c'è bisogno di farti l'albero.

translation.en: [sobs] It was perfect!
I thought we were gonna decorate the tree together with the children.
translation.it: Pensavo avremmo addobbato l'albero con i bambini.

translation.en: I don't want their toilet roll decorations.
translation.it: Non volevo le decorazioni di carta igienica.

translation.en: -It has to be exquisite. -Yes. Anything broken, dear?
translation.it: - Deve essere squisito. - Sì. Qualcosa di rotto, cara?

translation.en: Let me help you.
[woman] For once, I just want this family to have a perfect Christmas.
translation.it: Per una volta, voglio che il Natale sia perfetto.

translation.en: [Peter] Do you know what would be perfect, darling?
The Bahamas.
You, me, the kids, piña coladas.
translation.it: Tu, io, i bambini, piña coladas…

translation.en: Don't be a fool, Peter. We can't take Mummy to the Bahamas.
translation.it: Non essere sciocco. Non possiamo portarci la mamma.

translation.en: And what would I do about my sisters? We'll leave the key under the mat. They'll be fine.
translation.it: - E le mie sorelle? - Lasciamo loro la chiave. Staranno bene.

translation.en: There's so much to do.
I have to collect the wreath, pick up the kids. Get a new loo brush. Mum's had irritable bowel.
translation.it: Devo passare a prendere le ghirlande e i bambini. Serve uno scopino nuovo.

translation.en: -[woman] Redo the tree, obviously. -[chuckles]
And I need to get the presents to the Nightingale Lodge.
translation.it: E devo portare i regali al Nightingale Lodge.

translation.en: Of course you do, dear.
-Well? -And the presents are?
-Upstairs in the bedroom. -Which one, dear? We have many.
translation.it: - Sono di sopra, in camera. - Quale? Ne abbiamo tante.

translation.en: -Ours. -Ours?
Well, I suppose that's progress.
Caroline, darling, which bag is it?
[Caroline] Family on the left. Nightingale on the right.
translation.it: Famiglia a sinistra. Nightingale a destra.

translation.en: Right.
Darling, my right or bed right?
translation.it: La mia destra o la destra del letto?

translation.en: For goodness' sake, Peter!
Right. Right.
Right.
-[woman] Happy Christmas! -Thank you. Merry Christmas!
[boy] Look, Daisey, it's Mum!
[Caroline] I'm sorry. I'm here. I'm sorry I'm late.
-It's Mum! -[Caroline] Come on, kids.
-Thank you. -It's all right.
Merry Christmas.
-[mother] Merry Christmas. -Bye.
Come on then, kids. So, how was the party?
translation.it: Forza, ragazzi. Com'è andata la festa?

translation.en: Eliza's getting a bra for Christmas.
translation.it: Eliza avrà un reggiseno per Natale.

translation.en: Awesome. Lucky Eliza.
And how about you? Did you manage to get any chocolate in your mouth?
translation.it: E tu sei riuscito ad azzannare un po' di cioccolato?

translation.en: -He's eaten ten pieces. -[Caroline] Oh.
I don't want to play Mary. It's too much pressure.
translation.it: Non voglio fare Maria. C'è troppa pressione.

translation.en: But it's the lead. You're not a supporting actress.
-What do you want to be? A sheep? -I have to sing.
translation.it: - Cosa vuoi fare? Una pecora? - Devo cantare.

translation.en: Well, well, well. If it isn't the Virgin Mary.
translation.it: Guarda un po'. La Vergine Maria.

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, Alan.
Not you.
Oh yes. [laughs] Sorry, we're late.
translation.it: Oh, sì. Scusa, siamo in ritardo.

translation.en: Caroline Christmas-Hope, a lady like you is never late.
translation.it: Caroline Christmas-Hope, una donna come te non è mai in ritardo.

translation.en: She arrives precisely when she means to.
Charmer. Where would you like the presents?
Under the tree, of course.
-[Caroline] Oh, thank you. -Come on, kids.
Oh, Marie!
Not Marie. Caroline!
-Hello, everybody. Merry Christmas. -[man] Merry Christmas.
translation.it: - Salve a tutti. Buon Natale. - Buon Natale.

translation.en: Edna, dear. You're wearing odd shoes.
translation.it: Edna, cara. Le scarpe sono spaiate.

translation.en: She's got another pair just like it.
translation.it: Ne ha un altro paio uguale.

translation.en: [chuckles] Are you looking forward to the nativity play?
translation.it: Pronti per la recita della Natività?

translation.en: -Daisey's playing the Virgin Mary. -[exasperated] Mum!
translation.it: - Daisey fa la Vergine Maria. - Mamma!

translation.en: I played the Virgin Mary at the National Theatre.
translation.it: Ho interpretato la Vergine Maria al Royal National Theatre.

translation.en: My God, the people I slept with to get the part!
translation.it: Dio, con quante persone sono andata a letto per avere la parte!

translation.en: Bye, everyone.
Run.
[Caroline] Right, everybody out.
[Caroline] There we go. Oh, hang on.
Right. There.
Come on. Chop-chop.
Okay, got everything? Bags? Good. Great. In we go. There we go.
translation.it: Avete tutto? Le buste? Bene. Ottimo. Entriamo, su.

translation.en: Come on. In we go.
To the right. To the right. This way.
Hey, kids!
I thought we could finish this together.
Why don't we just stick this on top of the tree?
translation.it: Perché non ci metti questo in cima?

translation.en: -You know, that's a pretty good idea. -Yeah.
-It is, isn't it? It's a good idea. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Vero? È una buona idea. - Sì.

translation.en: Come with me.
That's too much.
[giggles] Yeah.
Do you remember last time? We put it all over the place.
translation.it: Ricordi l'ultima volta? L'abbiamo messo dappertutto.

translation.en: -Do you remember that? -I can make the best mince pies.
translation.it: - Te lo ricordi? - I miei tortini sono i migliori.

translation.en: It was funny though.
-What are we doing? -Mince pies.
translation.it: - Cosa prepariamo? - I tortini di carne.

translation.en: That looks amazing. Well done.
Look at this mess.
Mum, when's Grandma coming?
Tomorrow, darling.
You're not going to fight with Auntie Joanna, are you?
translation.it: Non litigherai con la zia Joanna, vero?

translation.en: Course not, darling.
It's Christmas.
-Can you hold that? -I will.
Thank you.
Hello, Mummy. Everything's going really well. This is going to be the best Christmas ever.
translation.it: Ciao, mamma. Sta andando tutto bene. Sarà il miglior Natale di sempre.

translation.en: -It doesn't have to be perfect, darling. -[Caroline] Yes, it does.
translation.it: Non dev'essere perfetto, tesoro. Invece sì. Mi ci sono voluti 27 anni di terapia

translation.en: I've had 27 years of therapy trying to recalibrate Christmas,
translation.it: Invece sì. Mi ci sono voluti 27 anni di terapia per ricalibrare il Natale

translation.en: ever since our shithead of a father abandoned us on Christmas Day.
translation.it: dopo che nostro padre ci ha abbandonate il giorno di Natale.

translation.en: Don't say it doesn't have to be perfect, 'cause it bloody well has to be.
translation.it: Non dire che non deve essere perfetto. Deve esserlo.

translation.en: So why don't you tell Hamish to put his foot down? You're already late.
translation.it: Perché non dici ad Hamish di accelerare? Siete in ritardo.

translation.en: [mother] Slight wrinkle.
Hamish is now Felix. She traded in her trader for a new one.
translation.it: Hamish ora è Felix. Ha scambiato il suo trader con uno nuovo.

translation.en: Give me that.
Excellent! Anything else I should know about?
translation.it: Eccellente! C'è altro che dovrei sapere?

translation.en: [woman] Caroline Christmas-Hope, you need to calm down.
It's only bloody Crimbo. The most important day of the year.
translation.it: - È solo Natale. - Il giorno più importante dell'anno.

translation.en: We don't want to stay in the Brontë room this year.
translation.it: Non vogliamo stare nella stanza Brontë.

translation.en: It's too cramped, and we need a really comfortable bed.
translation.it: È troppo stretta, e ci serve un letto comodo.

translation.en: Felix suffers from lumbago.
-Sciatica, darling. I'm not 83. -We'll take the Queen room.
translation.it: - Sciatica, tesoro. Non ho 83 anni. - Prendiamo la Queen.

translation.en: But Mummy has the Queen room.
Her knees are bad, and she actually likes your two awful little banshees.
translation.it: Le fanno male le ginocchia e adora i tuoi due mostriciattoli.

translation.en: I'm allergic to them. So we've agreed to do a swap.
translation.it: Io sono allergica. Faremo a cambio.

translation.en: -Bye! -Okay.
She's got her chaste little knickers in a twist again, Mummy.
translation.it: Si sta di nuovo agitando per nulla.

translation.en: Joanna Christmas, be nice. We'll be with you in about an hour.
translation.it: Joanna Christmas, sii gentile. Saremo da te tra un'ora.

translation.en: [Caroline] Okay.
Bye-bye.
Thanks for the ride. -Hey, hey! -[Daisey] Auntie Vicky!
[Vicky] Hi! Hey!
Hey, sis.
-Sis! -Vicky.
Never know how you're gonna turn up. I was hoping for a Red Arrow this year.
translation.it: Non so mai come arrivi. Speravo in una Red Arrow quest'anno.

translation.en: Come and see our Christmas tree. We made all the decorations ourselves.
translation.it: Vieni a vedere l'albero di Natale. Abbiamo fatto noi le decorazioni.

translation.en: Good Lord, darling. Look at that. It's a Rolls-Royce.
translation.it: Buon Dio, tesoro. È una Rolls-Royce.

translation.en: [Peter] That is sick!
Here we are again.
Christmas at Dunnock Manor,
capital of nowhere.
Hello, sis.
Hello.
-Hello. Wow, love the car. -Hi.
Merry Christmas. Hey, this place is absolutely idyllic.
translation.it: Buon Natale. Questo posto è davvero idilliaco.

translation.en: Yes. Hamish, lovely to meet you at last. Heard a lot about you.
translation.it: Hamish, piacere di conoscerti. Ho sentito molto parlare di te.

translation.en: -It's not Hamish. It's Felix. -Felix.
Hamish and Joanna split up.
translation.it: Hamish e Joanna si sono lasciati.

translation.en: -Nice outfit. -Oh.
Sexual repression is in. For once in your life, you're ahead of the curve.
translation.it: La repressione sessuale è di moda. Tu sei già in anticipo sui tempi.

translation.en: Well, probably for the best. Heard Hamish was a total tosser.
translation.it: Avevo sentito dire che Hamish era un coglione.

translation.en: -So you're much better. -[laughs]
Welcome, Felix.
-Lovely house. -Yes.
-Must have cost a packet. -Well, not really.
I think it was about £10
when one of my feudal ancestors picked it up a few centuries ago.
translation.it: quando uno dei miei antenati la rilevò qualche secolo fa.

translation.en: -Really? -So no need to be impressed. Nothing to do with me.
translation.it: Niente di impressionante. Io non c'entro nulla.

translation.en: -Let me show you around. Come on. -Oh, yes. [laughs]
translation.it: - Ti faccio fare un giro. Andiamo. - Sì.

translation.en: My wife, uh, Caroline.
-Hi, I'm Felix. -Hello.
-Welcome. -Pleasure.
[Peter] Darling.
Caroline! Caroline, darling. I… I… I think I'm stuck.
translation.it: Caroline, tesoro. Credo di essere bloccata.

translation.en: Mummy!
No, I… I am actually stuck.
-Hello. -Hello.
Happy Christmas, darling. Can you press that?
translation.it: Buon Natale, tesoro. Puoi premere lì?

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Paulina.
Or is it Doctor of Music Paulina?
Not yet. I've gotta finish my thesis. Have my boxes arrived?
translation.it: Non ancora. Devo finire la tesi. Le mie scatole sono arrivate?

translation.en: Yes, all of them. [chuckles]
Right, come along. Let's get you inside so you can complete your oeuvre.
translation.it: Su, entra dentro, così potrai completare la tua opera.

translation.en: The theme was supposed to be "The 12 Days of Christmas."
translation.it: Il tema era "I 12 giorni di Natale".

translation.en: [Joanna] But you went with the theme of sewage instead.
translation.it: Ma voi avete preferito la fogna.

translation.en: Nice work.
We decorated the Christmas tree with Daddy.
translation.it: Abbiamo decorato l'albero di Natale con papà.

translation.en: Oh, you really can't tell.
I think it's wonderful. Come and give your grandma a kiss.
translation.it: Penso che sia stupendo. Venite a dare un bacio a vostra nonna.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
I'm Vicky.
I'm, um…
Down, girl.
I'm Felix.
Hello, Auntie Joanna.
Don't call me Auntie! You know I hate that!
translation.it: Non chiamarmi "zia". Lo sai che lo odio.

translation.en: Is my present in there?
Touch it again, and I'll kill you! This bag is worth more than your kidneys.
translation.it: Toccala e ti uccido. Questa borsa vale più dei tuoi reni.

translation.en: Do you wanna look in my bag?
-Where did you get all these? -America.
translation.it: - Dove li hai presi? - In America.

translation.en: Which parts did you visit?
Every part.
Mm. I'm sure you did.
Say thank you.
Thank you, Auntie Vicky.
How on earth did you afford a trip across America?
translation.it: Come hai pagato il viaggio in America?

translation.en: You're always broke.
I couch-surfed.
Mattress-surfed, more like.
Felix, are you at the beginning or the end
translation.it: Felix, sei all'inizio o alla fine

translation.en: of a three-month relationship with my sister?
translation.it: della relazione di tre mesi con mia sorella?

translation.en: We've been together for ten weeks.
Yes, drinks, anyone?
Don't mind if I do.
What a bevy of beauties, eh?
All the sisters gathered together.
I can remember when you lot used to fight like Spitfires and Messerschmitts.
translation.it: Ricordo quando litigavate come gli Spitfire e i Messerschmitt.

translation.en: And now, four warring nations
translation.it: E ora, quattro nazioni in guerra

translation.en: peacefully working together in a loving sisterhood.
translation.it: che collaborano in armonia in una tenera sorellanza.

translation.en: Delightful! And…
a tribute to that bewitching mother of yours.
translation.it: Un tributo alla vostra incantevole madre.

translation.en: -Merry, merry Christmas to all of us! -Merry Christmas!
translation.it: - Buon Natale a tutti noi! - Buon Natale!

translation.en: [all] Merry Christmas!
[boy] Where did you get all this?
I went into Auntie Joanna's bags.
translation.it: Era nelle borse della zia Joanna.

translation.en: She said she'd kill us.
translation.it: Ha detto che ci avrebbe uccisi.

translation.en: She said she'd kill you. Now, sit still.
translation.it: Che avrebbe ucciso te. Ora non ti muovere.

translation.en: I need to do your blush.
Well, isn't this nice?
Bloody marvelous. I love Christmas. -Mm-hmm. -Should happen more often.
translation.it: Meraviglioso. Adoro il Natale. Dovrebbe esserci più spesso.

translation.en: Peter, refill, please.
Yes, dear.
Anyone else?
-Jolly good. -[Caroline chuckles]
Where's Paulina?
In the library working on her thesis.
translation.it: In biblioteca a lavorare alla sua tesi.

translation.en: [sighs] She's been working on her thesis for ten years.
translation.it: Lavora alla sua tesi da dieci anni.

translation.en: It's about the Fab Four. Why they split.
translation.it: È sui Fab Four e perché si sono sciolti.

translation.en: We all know why. It's 'cause Robbie wanted a solo career.
translation.it: Sappiamo tutti perché. Robbie voleva fare il solista.

translation.en: Right, I remember that.
No. Not Take That. The Beatles.
translation.it: Non i Take That. I Beatles.

translation.en: Ah, the '60s.
Sex and drugs and rock 'n' roll.
translation.it: Sesso, droga e rock and roll.

translation.en: But mostly sex.
Well, if Paulina won't come to us, maybe we should go to her.
translation.it: Se Paulina non viene da noi, andiamo noi da lei.

translation.en: Oh! And I have something to show you all in the library. Very exciting. Come on!
translation.it: E devo mostrarvi una cosa fantastica nella biblioteca. Forza.

translation.en: Yes. Yes, dear.
Paulina, are you really going to spend the next three days in a darkened room?
translation.it: Paulina, passerai i prossimi tre giorni in una stanza buia?

translation.en: I want to be left alone and write the ultimate dissertation
translation.it: Voglio stare da sola per scrivere la tesi suprema

translation.en: about the greatest rock band in the history of the world.
translation.it: sulla più grande rock band della storia.

translation.en: Oh, so you're writing about U2 now as well?
Felix, would you like to see some family photos?
translation.it: Felix, vuoi vedere delle foto di famiglia?

translation.en: Oh, I'd love to.
Of when I was growing up, and Joanna was at university.
translation.it: Di quando ero piccola e Joanna era all'università.

translation.en: I was ahead of my time. We're practically twins.
[sarcastic chuckle] A decade apart.
Forty-five and still--
Thirty-five! I'm thirty-five.
Younger than me. Interesting.
[chuckles] Sorry. I'd just like to go over the itinerary for the next few days.
translation.it: Scusate. Vorrei solo ripassare il programma.

translation.en: God, she's got a planner.
Christmas Eve is the grand buffet. Therefore tonight is heavy appetizers.
translation.it: Alla Vigilia, c'è il buffet. Quindi, stasera, solo stuzzichini.

translation.en: If you're all still hungry, go to the Plough Inn.
translation.it: Se avete fame, andate alla Plough Inn.

translation.en: Oh, Vicky, you like a good plowing.
translation.it: Vicky, magari ti trovi un materasso con cui scroccare qualcosa.

translation.en: That's 'cause I'm still young enough to sow my oats.
translation.it: Perché io sono ancora abbastanza giovane.

translation.en: [Caroline] Yes, and tomorrow we have the Howden Christmas Fair,
translation.it: Domani andremo alla fiera di Natale di Howden,

translation.en: which, as always, will be oodles of fun.
translation.it: in cui ci divertiremo un mondo.

translation.en: But I've just got to Yoko. The fair is a Christmas tradition.
translation.it: - Ma sono appena arrivata a Yoko. - È una tradizione natalizia.

translation.en: Christmas Day, we've got a nativity play at the Nightingale Lodge.
translation.it: A Natale, al Nightingale Lodge, assisteremo alla recita della Natività.

translation.en: Ooh, love a whiff of urine and old fart on Christmas Day.
translation.it: Niente di meglio dell'aroma di pipì e scoregge a Natale.

translation.en: Joanna, maybe we can get you a room.
translation.it: Forse per te c'è posto, Joanna.

translation.en: Please, could we just be a family and have a lovely Christmas?
translation.it: Vi prego, possiamo comportarci come una famiglia per questo Natale?

translation.en: [whispers] Thank you.
So, Boxing Day--
Which happens to be a very special day because--
translation.it: Che è un giorno speciale perché…

translation.en: -Yes, Peter, please. -I married the love of my life.
translation.it: - Sì, Peter. - …ho sposato l'amore della mia vita.

translation.en: Wow! Really?
That's brilliant. [laughs]
And I was your bridesmaid.
-And I was-- -The old maid.
So, rooms.
You know what? We're gonna go stay at the Plough Inn.
-We are? -But why? Your room's all ready.
translation.it: - Ah, sì? - Perché? La stanza è pronta.

translation.en: -I just carried everything upstairs. -And you can bring them down again.
translation.it: - Ho portato tutto di sopra. - Riporta tutto giù.

translation.en: I refuse to spend another night under the same roof as you.
translation.it: Mi rifiuto di passare un'altra notte sotto il tuo stesso tetto.

translation.en: Okay. [laughs]
That's not very Christmassy.
[Peter] You sure you can't convince her to stay? The Plough Inn is no Savoy.
translation.it: Non riesci a convincerla a restare? La locanda non è il Savoy.

translation.en: [chuckles] Joanna is very strong-willed. Probably not worth the fight.
translation.it: Joanna è molto determinata. Non vale la pena provarci.

translation.en: Well, if you change your mind, you can always come back here.
translation.it: Se cambi idea, puoi sempre tornare.

translation.en: -You can have my room. -Your room?
translation.it: - Puoi avere la mia stanza. - La tua stanza?

translation.en: Are you not sleeping in the same room as your wife?
Uh, apparently, I snore, spin, steal the bedsheets… Generally annoying.
translation.it: A quanto pare, russo, mi giro, rubo le coperte… Sono una scocciatura.

translation.en: How long you been married?
It'll be 18 years on Boxing Day.
And how long you been sleeping by yourself?
translation.it: E da quanto tempo dormi da solo?

translation.en: Eighteen months.
-So no… -No, no. [inhales deeply] Not for a while, no.
translation.it: - Quindi niente… - No. Non da un po', no.

translation.en: Can I ask you a question?
Sure.
How old is Joanna?
For… for… thirties. Thereabouts.
I think she's the one.
-Really? -Yeah.
Good for you.
No one in this family respects what I'm doing.
translation.it: Nessuno in questa famiglia rispetta ciò che faccio.

translation.en: I have dedicated my life to John, Paul, George, and Ringo.
translation.it: Ho dedicato la mia vita a John, Paul, George e Ringo.

translation.en: Paulina, even the Beatles didn't dedicate their lives to the Beatles.
translation.it: Paulina, neanche i Beatles hanno dedicato la loro vita ai Beatles.

translation.en: God, I loathe our little sister.
Um, would you like a plate?
I'm not hungry.
Food!
You take one more step towards me,
I swear to God, I will rip out your larynx and wrap it round your tits.
translation.it: e giuro che ti strappo la laringe e te la attorciglio sulle tette.

translation.en: Take a joke, Joanna.
You'd think you'd be able to at your age.
translation.it: Dovresti saperle reggere… alla tua età.

translation.en: These were for tomorrow.
Dad's in Florida.
What?
How do you know?
I saw him.
From a distance?
-I stayed with him. -[gasps]
You stayed with him?
-For a week. Maybe two. -[inaudible] Oh my God.
-[gasps] -With Jackie.
-That's his-- -[Caroline] Hello, Mum! [laughs]
What are you girls talking about?
Oh, you know. Christmas.
Yummy.
Mum, your buttons are all done wrong on your blouse.
translation.it: Mamma, hai abbottonato male la blusa.

translation.en: Silly me. I'm losing the plot.
You'll have to get a room for me at Nightingale Lodge.
translation.it: Dovrai trovarmi una stanza al Nightingale Lodge.

translation.en: -[Caroline laughs nervously] -You can share Joanna's.
-Would you like a plate? -[Elizabeth] Mm. Thank you.
-Did you make this, darling? -Yes, it's for tomorrow.
translation.it: - L'hai fatto tu, tesoro? - Sì, è per domani.

translation.en: Silly me, asking about your private life.
translation.it: Non dovevo chiedere della tua vita privata.

translation.en: -[Peter chuckles] -I didn't mean to intrude.
translation.it: Non dovevo chiedere della tua vita privata. - Non volevo essere invadente. - Non ti preoccupare.

translation.en: Please, do not worry about it.
translation.it: - Non volevo essere invadente. - Non ti preoccupare.

translation.en: That's marriage. Really?
Oh yes. You'll find out soon enough.
It's wonderful. [chuckles]
Vicky, when you went to Florida,
did you by any chance invite anyone for Christmas?
translation.it: hai per caso invitato qualcuno per Natale?

translation.en: I might have done.
Who on earth comes from Florida?
Do you think that was a good idea,
translation.it: Ti è sembrata una buona idea

translation.en: or that maybe you should have asked the host first?
translation.it: o magari avresti dovuto chiedere prima alla padrona di casa?

translation.en: -Did he come? -They came.
-Is it who I think it is? -[squeaky] Mm-hmm!
No way!
Who is it, darling?
Yeah, well, whoever it is, I'm gonna let them in, darling.
translation.it: Chiunque sia, li farò entrare, tesoro.

translation.en: I mean, it's cold outside.
Especially if they have come all the way from Florida. [chuckles]
Merry Christmas, everyone.
Girls.
I know it's been a long time.
translation.it: So che è passato tanto tempo.

translation.en: Uh, this is my girlfriend, Jackie.
translation.it: Questa è la mia ragazza, Jackie.

translation.en: Hi! [giggles] It's so nice to meet you all.
translation.it: Ciao! È davvero un piacere conoscervi.

translation.en: Oh my God! This castle is so adorable.
translation.it: Oddio, questo castello è così adorabile.

translation.en: How could Princess Meghan leave this?
translation.it: E la Principessa Meghan ha rinunciato a tutto questo?

translation.en: I… I should introduce myself. I'm your son-in-law.
-Peter. -Peter.
-Yes. It's a pleasure. -Yeah.
Hello.
Hi. I'm, uh, Joanna's boyfriend, Felix.
translation.it: Ciao. Sono il ragazzo di Joanna, Felix.

translation.en: Right.
[gasps] Hi.
-Hi. [chuckles] -Yes, hi.
-[James] Lilibet? -[gasps]

translation.it: Sì, e sono fedeli a vita.

translation.en: -I thought that was seahorses. -[screams] Who cares?
translation.it: - Pensavo fossero i cavallucci marini. - Che importa?

translation.en: My wife is having an affair.
And she's pregnant…
with another man.
I'm leaving.
On Christmas Day?
Why not? It's a family tradition!
translation.it: Perché no? È una tradizione di famiglia.

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Peter.
[Peter] Is it?
[James] Going somewhere?
As far away from here as possible!
translation.it: Il più lontano possibile da qui.

translation.en: Is he still upset about the electricity?
Eighteen months. Eighteen months!
English men are so emotional.
translation.it: Gli uomini inglesi sono così emotivi.

translation.en: -Something is very wrong. -Eee.
Merry Christmas, kids.
[both] Merry Christmas, Granddad.
[both] Presents! Presents!
-Merry Christmas. Merry Christmas. -Ah. Merry Christmas.
We should wait for Daddy.
[Caroline] Peter! Presents!
Sometimes this house is just too big.
translation.it: A volte questa casa è troppo grande.

translation.en: You can open two.
[Henry] What's this?
Mum, this is just weird.
Like, really weird.
It's because Father Christmas couldn't see the house.
translation.it: È successo perché Babbo Natale non poteva vedere la casa.

translation.en: No, it's because your father mixed up the presents.
translation.it: No, è perché tuo padre ha confuso i regali.

translation.en: Got him. I've got him again. Another one. Another one.
translation.it: Beccato! L'ho preso di nuovo. Un altro!

translation.en: This is the best Christmas ever.
translation.it: È il miglior Natale di sempre.

translation.en: [Caroline] Peter!
-Peter! -[James] Caroline.
Peter, where are you?
He was very upset.
Well, he should be. He can't do anything right.
translation.it: Bene. Non ne combina una giusta.

translation.en: You're awfully hard on him.
Oh, I'm sorry. Is this a sausage club where you all stick up for each other?
translation.it: Scusa. È una sagra delle salsicce dove vi sostenete a vicenda?

translation.en: Peter's gone. What do you mean, "gone"?
translation.it: - Peter se n'è andato. - Che significa "andato"?

translation.en: He left. He said he wanted to get as far away from here as possible.
translation.it: Ha detto che voleva andare il più lontano possibile da qui.

translation.en: [scoffs] Because he mixed up the presents?
I don't know. He was very distracted. He didn't make a lot of sense.
translation.it: Non lo so. Era molto distratto. Diceva cose senza senso.

translation.en: He wouldn't just leave for no reason. He's not you.
translation.it: Non se ne sarebbe andato senza un motivo. Non è te.

translation.en: Leaving you was the most difficult thing I did in my life.
translation.it: Lasciarvi è stata la cosa più difficile che abbia mai fatto.

translation.en: I should have fought harder for you.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto lottare di più per voi.

translation.en: Yes, you should have.
I'm going to get ready and find my husband.
translation.it: Mi vesto e vado a trovare mio marito.

translation.en: Yeah, so much for great British wood.
translation.it: Sì, alla faccia del fantastico legno inglese.

translation.en: Happy Christmas, Mr. Fox.
-Hm. What a mess. -Yeah.
Hey, I love your work, by the way.
[scoffs] It's just a thesis.
It would make a very good book.
-Really? -Yeah.
I mean, I can feel the passion, your love for those mop-top boys.
translation.it: Sento la tua passione e il tuo amore per quei capelloni.

translation.en: They're the only boys I've ever really liked.
translation.it: Sono gli unici ragazzi che mi piacciono.

translation.en: Look, I was thinking, could I take it to my people?
translation.it: Senti, potrei portare la tesi dai miei colleghi?

translation.en: I think they'd love it. But I… I thought you were a stockbroker.
translation.it: - Credo che a loro piacerebbe. - Ma pensavo che fossi un agente di borsa.

translation.en: No, that was Hamish. No, I'm into publishing.
translation.it: No, quello era Hamish. No, io sono nell'editoria.

translation.en: I work with cars, books, magazines.
We also have a great music department in Los Angeles.
translation.it: Abbiamo anche un ottimo reparto musicale a Los Angeles.

translation.en: [Caroline] Vicky!
Vicky! Vicky! Vicky!
[Vicky] What? I'm asleep.
Are you pregnant?
Well, somebody left a positive pregnancy test in my bathroom,
translation.it: Qualcuno ha lasciato nel mio bagno un test di gravidanza positivo.

translation.en: and Peter saw it, and now he's gone.
translation.it: Peter l'ha visto e se n'è andato.

translation.en: [gasps] Paulina!
Christmas is ruined!
[sobs] Christmas is canceled.
Sweetheart, what's the matter?
There's no food.
And Peter's left me.
Why?
The foxes ate it all.
No, no. Why did Peter leave you?
translation.it: No. Perché Peter ti ha lasciata?

translation.en: [sobbing] Because he thinks I'm having an affair.
translation.it: Perché pensa che io abbia una relazione.

translation.en: -Are you? -[Caroline] No!
Then why does he think you have a fancy man?
translation.it: Allora perché crede che tu abbia un amante?

translation.en: Because he thinks I'm pregnant.
translation.it: Perché pensa che io sia incinta.

translation.en: -Are you? -No!
I need to know whose this is. Somebody's pregnant.
translation.it: Devo sapere di chi è questo. Una donna qui è incinta.

translation.en: It's mine.
You're pregnant?
Yes.
I've done ten tests in ten days, and… they're always the same.
translation.it: Ho fatto dieci test in dieci giorni e il risultato è sempre lo stesso.

translation.en: [Felix] Oh my God.
Is it mine?
[splutters] Of course it's yours.
I'm gonna get so fat.
It's wonderful.
No, it's not wonderful. I'm gonna have a bloody baby.
translation.it: No, non è meraviglioso. Avrò un bambino.

translation.en: It's bloody brilliant.
We're gonna be a family.
-We are? -Yes.
That's great. Congratulations.
But because of you, my husband's left me because he thinks I'm an adulterer.
translation.it: Ma, a causa tua, mio marito mi ha lasciata e mi crede un'adultera.

translation.en: Here.
Thank you.
Still,
I guess it's tradition for the men in this family to walk out on Christmas Day.
translation.it: Immagino sia una tradizione per gli uomini qui andarsene a Natale.

translation.en: That's not fair.
Mummy, how can you defend him after what he did to you?
translation.it: Mamma, come puoi difenderlo dopo quello che ti ha fatto?

translation.en: After what I did to him.
translation.it: E quello che gli ho fatto io.

translation.en: Elizabeth. Now is not the time.
Then when is the time?
They need to know, James.
I can't live with this secret anymore.
translation.it: Non posso più vivere con questo segreto.

translation.en: What secret?
I broke your father's heart. What do you mean?
translation.it: - Ho spezzato il cuore a vostro padre. - Che vuoi dire?

translation.en: Your father left because I had an affair.
translation.it: Se n'è andato perché ho avuto una relazione.

translation.en: Thank you.
And a baby.
Please don't blame your mother.
translation.it: Non date la colpa a vostra madre.

translation.en: Sometimes things just happen.
[sobs] It's me, isn't it?
[sobbing] I always knew I was different.
translation.it: Ho sempre saputo di essere diversa.

translation.en: Oh, don't be ridiculous, Joanna.
We had you when we were still in our teens.
translation.it: Ti abbiamo avuta quando eravamo adolescenti.

translation.en: It's me.
Well, then who's my father?
Look what's for dinner.
Oh God, no.
What on earth is going on? Has Greek drama come to Dunnock Manor? What?
translation.it: Che diavolo sta succedendo? C'è una tragedia greca a Dunnock Manor?

translation.en: You're my father.
Guilty as charged.
[Henry] Is Daddy back from his walk?
If we're going to do this nativity play, we need to go now.
translation.it: Se vogliamo fare la recita della Natività, dobbiamo andare.

translation.en: Oh Mary Mother of Jesus.
Right, and I can't be late.
translation.it: Giusto, e non posso fare tardi.

translation.en: Don't worry, sweetheart. You won't be late. I'll find your Dad.
translation.it: Non farete tardi. Troverò io vostro padre.

translation.en: John, I need your help. Come on.
translation.it: John, mi serve il tuo aiuto. Andiamo.

translation.en: Well, what a lovely reunion, eh?
Laughter, tears, good old-fashioned punch-up.
-Something for everyone. -We'll talk one day.
translation.it: - Per tutti i gusti. - Un giorno parleremo.

translation.en: Right now, you're gonna help save a marriage for once.
translation.it: Per ora, mi aiuterai a salvare un matrimonio.

translation.en: James, um,
I'm sorry, uh…
sorry you behaved much better than I did.
translation.it: Mi dispiace che tu ti sia comportato molto meglio di me.

translation.en: Well, thank you.
This could be the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere l'inizio di una bella amicizia.

translation.en: -Hm. -Let's go.
[reverend] Thank you.
Thank you. Ah, thank you all.
And a very Merry Christmas.
translation.it: E un buon Natale a tutti voi.

translation.en: This year, as always, the children are well-prepared,
translation.it: Quest'anno, come sempre, i bambini si sono preparati

translation.en: with the help of their wonderful teacher, Mrs. Stressel…
translation.it: con l'aiuto della loro maestra, la sig.na Stressel…

translation.en: who will also accompany them on the piano.
So, please, enjoy!
It was in a bleak midwinter
when Mary and Joseph made their way to Bethlehem.
translation.it: Maria e Giuseppe si stavano dirigendo verso Betlemme.

translation.en: How much longer, Joseph? I'm so tired.
Get in this. We'll be there in no time.
Have you booked a room in Bethlehem?
translation.it: Hai prenotato una stanza a Betlemme?

translation.en: Actually, the Nightingale Lodge.
I hope it's not full.
It's okay. I sent them a text.
[Peter] James.
You know, my wife, your daughter, is having an affair,
translation.it: Mia moglie, tua figlia, ha una relazione

translation.en: and she's having a baby with someone else.
translation.it: ed è incinta di un altro uomo.

translation.en: No, she's not. It's Joanna's baby.
translation.it: No. È il figlio di Joanna.

translation.en: No way.
[splutters] Is it Felix? Yes.
[sighs] Oh God!
-Sorry. -[chuckles]
-Oh, Caroline must be furious with me. -She is.
translation.it: - Caroline dev'essere furiosa con me. - Lo è.

translation.en: I know that look.
What look?
The face of a man who wishes he'd handled things a little differently.
translation.it: Il viso di un uomo che vorrebbe aver gestito le cose in modo diverso.

translation.en: Especially with his family.
You know, I was so wrapped up trying to build a practice
translation.it: Ero così preso dall'avviare la mia attività

translation.en: that I actually neglected my wife and my girls.
translation.it: che ho trascurato mia moglie e le mie figlie.

translation.en: And my big brother, John, was there to fill in for me.
translation.it: E mio fratello maggiore, John, era lì per sostituirmi.

translation.en: Which he did.
In any number of ways.
So that Christmas morning, I ran.
translation.it: Così, quella mattina di Natale, scappai via.

translation.en: I couldn't face it.
Until Vicky came to visit me in Miami…
translation.it: Finché Vicky non è venuta a trovarmi a Miami,

translation.en: completely unaware that she's the reason I left.
translation.it: senza sapere di essere la causa della mia partenza.

translation.en: And I decided it was finally time to put an end to all this nonsense.
translation.it: Così ho deciso che era giunto il momento di mettere fine a questa storia.

translation.en: How do you mean?
I love Vicky as my own daughter.
translation.it: Voglio bene a Vicky come se fosse mia figlia.

translation.en: But she is John and Elizabeth's child.
translation.it: Ma è la figlia di John ed Elizabeth.

translation.en: This is why I left.
translation.it: Ecco perché me ne sono andato.

translation.en: Any fool could see how much in love they were. Still are, for that matter.
translation.it: Era chiaro a tutti quanto si amassero. E si amano ancora.

translation.en: Just as any fool could see how much in love you and Caroline are.
translation.it: Come è chiaro a tutti quanto tu e Caroline vi amiate.

translation.en: Now, get up. [clears throat]
I've got some grandchildren to see in their Christmas pageant.
translation.it: Ho dei nipotini da vedere nella recita di Natale.

translation.en: Think you'd wanna be there too.
Yes.
Behold, the Christmas star.
♪ Away in a manger ♪
translation.it: Lontano, lontano è nato il Signor

translation.en: ♪ No crib for a bed ♪
♪ The little Lord Jesus ♪
♪ Laid down his sweet head ♪
♪ The stars in the bright sky ♪ ♪ Looked down where… ♪
translation.it: Vegliavan le stelle dal Cielo lassù…

translation.en: Sorry. Sorry. Sorry.
[Peter] Hi.
I… I'm so sorry.
I'm so sorry. I love you, you silly thing.
translation.it: Mi dispiace tanto. Ti amo, sciocchino.

translation.en: Your dad came to get me.
translation.it: Tuo padre è venuto da me.

translation.en: He's an amazing man.
[inaudible] Thank you.
Why does Wise Man Number Three have his guinea pig with him?
translation.it: Perché uno dei Re Magi ha con sé il suo criceto?

translation.en: Oh, he thinks I'm gonna chop its head off.
translation.it: Pensa che voglia tagliargli la testa.

translation.en: You're gonna be an incredible mother.
I have missed you, big brother.
I've missed you, little brother.
Bravo!
[Alan] Hello! Hi. Hi.
Now, I really hope we all enjoy our delicious Christmas meal.
translation.it: Spero che potremo goderci tutti il nostro squisito pasto natalizio.

translation.en: But before we do, I think it is important
translation.it: Ma, prima, credo che sia importante

translation.en: that we say a big thank you to the Christmas family
translation.it: ringraziare di cuore la famiglia Christmas

translation.en: who have stepped in very kindly to serve food for you today.
translation.it: che, molto gentilmente, si è fatta avanti per servire il cibo.

translation.en: -Beans? You're not a has-been. -Yes, please. You must have sprouts at Christmas.
translation.it: - Fagiolini? Sì, certo. - I cavolini di Bruxelles.

translation.en: What kind of music do you like?
Oh, anything from the Beatles.
-[woman] Yes. -[man] Yes.
It's… Did you not? There we are.
translation.it: È… Non l'hai fatto? Ecco qua.

translation.en: Jambo, could we live in England?
-Nothing would make me happier. -[squeals, laughs]
Can we get a modern castle? Like, maybe five years old?
translation.it: Possiamo avere un castello moderno? Vecchio di non più di cinque anni?

translation.en: Sure, honey.
-[Edna] Not with turkey. -Too fattening.
It'll make me grow, won't it?
Uncle John, it's gonna be very weird for me to call you Dad.
translation.it: Zio John, sarà molto strano per me chiamarti papà.

translation.en: Would 30 years of pocket money help?
Oh, my darling. I love you so much.
One more?
-[woman] One more. -Yeah?
-Darling, I am so sorry about the meal. -Oh, don't worry about it.
translation.it: - Tesoro, mi dispiace per il cibo. - Tranquillo.

translation.en: I really need to, uh, fix that fence.
Honestly, this has been the best Christmas ever.
translation.it: È stato il Natale migliore di sempre.

translation.en: Good Lord, I love you.
This is gonna be the finest turkey you've ever eaten in your life.
translation.it: Sarà il tacchino migliore della vostra vita.

translation.en: Dude, you're giving her so much turkey.
[Jackie] That's a lot of turkey.
Oh my God, I forgot Ben.
-Who's Ben? -The bartender.
I left him back at the house tied up on the bed.
translation.it: L'ho lasciato a casa legato sul letto.

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about it. He'll get used to it.
Do you really want to marry me?
Of course I do. I love you.
But promise me this. We spend next Christmas with my family.
translation.it: Ma promettimi solo che il prossimo Natale sarà con la mia famiglia.

translation.en: Of course. Where do they live?
-Bahamas. -Yes!
Is it okay if I bring my family?
I just wish it would have snowed.
Leave it with me. The name's not Christmas for nothing.
translation.it: Ci penso io. Ho il Natale nel nome, dopotutto.

translation.en: Oh, honey!
